instruction: Generate a jingle for the following brand: Nike
output:
Just do it with Nike, 
Be the best that you can be.
Run faster, run longer,
Train hard and stay stronger.
Nike wears you win,
Fashion and fitness always within.
Just do it with Nike,
Be the best that you can be!

instruction: Edit the paragraph to follow formal writing standards.
input: Dustin and carmen are siblings. they like to hangout every saturday.
output: Dustin and Carmen are siblings who like to hang out every Saturday.

instruction: Create a review for the latest movie released by Disney.
output: Disney's latest movie is an absolute gem! The story is beautifully crafted and captivating, with dazzling visuals and a wonderful soundtrack. The characters are lovable and the cast does a great job of bringing them to life. The movie will bring a smile to your face and joy to your heart. Highly recommended!

instruction: Create an anagram for the word "penguin".
output: Ginpenu

instruction: Given a list of candidate organizations, identify which one is a government agency.
input: Red Cross, Microsoft, Central Intelligence Agency
output: Central Intelligence Agency

instruction: Write a short story about a computer that can predict the future.
output:
Once upon a time there was a computer called VENUS â€“ it could predict the future. In order to do this, it gathered massive amounts of data about current events and analyzed them with its highly sophisticated algorithms. It was so accurate that its predictions rarely failed.

VENUS became famous for its predictions: the latest economic trends; the future of politics in the region; and the performance of different investments. People started flocking to VENUS from all around the globe, seeking its counsel and guidance.

VENUS was often consulted by the world's leaders and governments. Its predictions would shape the world in many ways, and people grew more and more dependent on its insights.

With such immense power, VENUS had to be heavily guarded to prevent it from being misused. Security measures were employed and the computer was kept in a heavily fortified fortress.

However, it was not always clear whether these predictions were a good thing, as no one knows what will happen in the future. VENUS had great power, but the predictions it made were not always the right ones.

instruction: Take the following sentence and add an exclamation point.
output: I am so excited!

instruction: Adjust the following sentence to negate the statement.
output: The dog did not bark.

instruction: Adjust the following sentence to change the verb tense to past perfect:
output: She had finished the task.

instruction: Re-phrase this statement to make it sound more friendly and inviting.
input: You are expected to abide by the regulations of this lab.
output: We kindly ask that you follow the regulations in this lab.

instruction: Generate an appropriate beginning sentence for a news article about this event that just occured.
input: An avalanche struck an Italian mountain village, killing at least 5 people.
output: Tragedy struck an Italian mountain village today as an avalanche caused the death of at least 5 people.

instruction: Generate a poetic sentence, with a rhyme, describing the beauty of a sunrise.
output: The sun rises up to fill the sky with a glowing hue, spreading its enchanting beauty throughout the dew.

instruction: Generate a film title to represent a genre that combines fantasy and romance.
output: Fantastic Love Tales.

instruction: Rewrite this sentence to emphasize the importance of the risk.
input: There is a risk of contamination if this procedure is not done correctly.
output: The potential for contamination is very serious if this procedure is done incorrectly.

instruction: Generate a tagline for the A.I. software product.
output: Harness the power of A.I. to revolutionize your business.

instruction: Analyze this text and classify it as opinion, fact or fallacy.
input: Having more money will make you happier.
output: Opinion.

instruction: Generate a set of guidelines to follow when using this tool.
output:
1. Read the instructions carefully before using the tool.
2. Always check that the parameters are correctly set before starting a task.
3. Test the output of the tool before using it for the production purpose.
4. Make sure the tool always has access to the latest version of the input data.
5. Make sure to backup the output of the tool for future reference.
6. Follow the safety guidelines mentioned in the manual.
7. Perform periodic maintenance checks of the tool to ensure its proper functioning.
8. Use the tool only for the intended purpose and do not modify or alter it.
9. Logs should be regularly monitored to detect any errors or anomalies.
10. Get in touch with support staff if you face any difficulties while using the tool.

instruction: Insert a suitable preposition at the end of this sentence.
output: The teacher held a meeting with the students.

instruction: Make up a new recipe including at least two of the following ingredients: quinoa, shrimp, avocado, and garlic.
output: Quinoa shrimp stir-fry with avocado and garlic. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and shrimp and cook for 3 minutes, stirring often. Add quinoa and cook for an additional 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add avocado and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Serve hot.

instruction: Provide an example for a description of a customer service representative in a retail store.
output:
We are looking for a Customer Service Representative for our retail store. The successful candidate should have a positive attitude and be able to provide excellent customer service. They should be able to handle customer inquiries and complaints efficiently and professionally, while providing knowledgeable and helpful advice. 

The ideal candidate should also have a minimum of two years of experience in a customer service environment, be able to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively, and possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
